sources.autograph: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.610. 'Mese di Marzo 1796. Quartettino per due violini, viola, e violoncello obbl.o di Luigi Boccherini, compositor di camera di S.M. il Re di Prussia'
ms_copies_parts: Berlin, Deutsche Staatsbibliothek, M.611. Copy made in Berlin for Frederick William II.
sources.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 40 no. 3 (for title and comment, see No. 249)
modern_editions: (1960?), Hamburg, Marbot: Op. 40 no. 3 (separate parts; revised by W. Höckner)
1963, Wilhelmshaven, Heinrichshofen's, in the series Pegasus Kammermusik Ausgaben: Op. 40 no. 3 (separate parts; revised by H. Mlynarczyk)

entries.notes: The above theme is also used by Boccherini in the piano quintet in D Major Op. 56 no. 5 of 1797 (see No. 411).

continues_from_previous.first_edition: 1798, Paris, Pleyel: Op. 40 no. 2 (for title and comment, see No. 249)

partial_notes: Page shows the continuation of entry 237 from previous page and the complete entry 237 with its quartet information
